article_metadata.description: U.S. Rep. Brett Guthrie, R-Bowling Green, discussed his ideas for growing manufacturing jobs and increasing competitiveness during a roundtable discussion Friday with members of the local manufacturing and business community.
article_metadata.author: KATIE BRANDENBURG The Daily News kbrandenburg@bgdailynews.com 783-3242

og.description: U.S. Rep. Brett Guthrie, R-Bowling Green, discussed his ideas for growing manufacturing jobs and increasing competitiveness during a roundtable discussion Friday with members of the local manufacturing and business community.
og.title: Guthrie tries REBUILDing manufacturing
